Musters married in 1873 Herminia, daughter of George Williams of Sucre, Bolivia. She wrote A Book of Hunting Songs and Sport, which was published in 1885 by Richard Allen in Nottingham.
thumb|An advertisement for the Nottingham and Newark Mercury published by Richard Allen in the Midland Counties’ Railway Companion of 1840

In 1834, Samuel Bennett succeeded Jonathan Dunn as publisher, but he died two years later in 1836 and was succeeded by Richard Allen when it changed its name to the Nottingham Mercury. In 1838 its sale was a little over 1,000 per week.
